title: DEO [FINAL] 2013 PC - Foxy Games
description:
Details
****************

Language(s): MULTi-7 
Release: 2013-10-18
Platform: PC 
Size: 817 MB
Genre(s): Action, Adventure


Description
******************

Enter the fairy world of the little angel Deo. His magical crown has been stolen by the evil demon Lukas. Now Deo faces a challenge to find the crown before it's too late. To succeed he must pass through five locked gates located across five worlds. The last gate leads to the Lukas' Den, where Deo has to come face to face with Lukas to get his crown back.


Deo is a 3D adventure-platform game with unique input model. The rich set of actions and game mechanics make Deo a truly challenging game for even the most experienced gamers. This is Deo - ultimate platformer for hardcore gamers.

Features
***************

- 5 worlds, 24 levels of forest, snow, aquatic, mountain, lava and desert areas.
- day/night/afternoon level themes combined with snowy, foggy, rainy and stormy weather for one unforgettable and exciting adventure.
- Dynamic game play in huge three dimensional areas, each having its secrets.
- As far as actions, Deo can run, jump, glide and throw fireballs in response to the enemies or obstacles in his path.
- Featuring a cutting edge "smart" camera system for seamless, dynamical game experience.
- Translated in seven languages - English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian and Bulgarian.
- Original soundtrack by Lucky Lion StudiosÃ‚Â®.
- Full controller support.
